briefdescription.para: Create a dynamic char * stream data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The initial size of the buffer in characters
An optional output file stream handle that is used to write the collected data to (defaults to stdout if NULL)

briefdescription.para: Discard the current content of the dynamic char * stream data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Free the memory occupied by a dynamic char * stream data structure.

detaileddescription.para: This function first flushes any remaining character data within the stream and then free's the memory occupied by the data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Free the memory occupied by a dynamic char * stream and close the output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function first flushes any remaining character data within the stream then closes the attached output file stream (if any), and finally free's the memory occupied by the data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Flush the dynamic char * output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function flushes the collected char * stream, either by writing to the attached file handle, or simply by writing to stdout if no file handle has been attached upon construction using vrna_cstr().

simplesect.para: The stream buffer is empty after execution of this function

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to flush

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, const char *structure, const char *format, va_list args)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_vprintf_structure

briefdescription.para: Implementation of a dynamic, buffered character stream.
